site.Title: IP Snoop
site.Description: What is my IP? IP Snoop answers this question.
site.Subtitle: This light-weight app for Windows Phone 7 shows your current IP-address.
site.MetaDescription: The Windows Phone app which shows your current IP address.
site.MetaKeywords: ip, ip address, wp7, windows phone, wp7 ip address, windows phone, ip address app, wp7 apps

Features.Feature: See your current IP-address and other network related information. IP Snoop is fast and light-weight.
IP Snoop has a live tile support. The tile updates automatically to show your current IP.
Easily share your IP-address with others by using the built-in email sending.

site.FeaturesSubtitle: Easy-to-use app to see your current IP with Windows Phone 7
site.HelpSubtitle: if you have any worries with this Windows Phone app
site.NewsSubtitle: The latest info about IRC7. What's in future of this IRC app?
site.Feedback: Please, contact us if you have any problems or if you have ideas about how to make this Windows Phone app better.
